posts.post_title: FS: Pick my Shag OM for me - SOLD
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING

Have 2 Shags and only need 1. Will post prices for both. If one sells, the other comes off the market.

$KEPT PSA 4.5
$SOLD PSA 3

Shoot me a PM if interested and have any questions. Anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for looking!
